title: Krunch Burger
description: Krunch fillet, spicy mayo, lettuce, sandwiched between a sesame seed bun

title: Omelette McMuffin Meal
description: The best way to start the day! Nestled between a toasted English muffin is a perfectly cooked omelet loaded with capsicum, onions, tomato, and enhanced with a slice of melted cheese. Enjoy it with a hot beverage of your choice and a crispy hash brown.

title: Zinger Stacker Combo

title: Chicken Mac
description: Our classic burger made with 2 breaded chicken patties, cheese, lettuce, creamy mayo, and a bun in the middle! Enjoy it with a chilled cold drink of your choice and our world famous crispy fries.

title: Double McChicken Meal
description: The classic double patty burger! Our quality chicken breast, cooked in a seasoned tempura coating, topped with fresh-grown lettuce and our exceptional McChicken sauce between a sesame seed bun, makes for a hard to beat classic. Enjoy it with a chilled cold drink of your choice and our world famous crispy fries.
